title: Go
description: Go is a statically typed, compiled language designed for simplicity and efficiency.

snippets.Variables:
var x int = 5
var name string = "John"
y := 10  // Short declaration
const PI = 3.14
snippets.Maps:
ages := map[string]int{
    "John": 30,
    "Alice": 25,
}

ages["Bob"] = 35
value, exists := ages["John"]
delete(ages, "Alice")
